item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Short Advertisement Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced video editor to join our team and work on our short advertisement videos. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing the footage to create engaging and visually appealing content that aligns with our brand. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques, excellent attention to detail, and the ability to work under tight deadlines.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and enhance raw footage to create high-quality short advertisement videos
  - Ensure the videos align with our brand guidelines and objectives
  - Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and deliverables
  - Implement visual effects, transitions, and graphics to enhance the overall video quality

  Requirements:
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Strong understanding of video editing techniques and best practices
  - Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within tight deadlines
  - Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with team members

  If you have a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually stunning videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work along with your application.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are excited to announce that we are currently seeking a highly talented and creative Content Creator who specializes in TikTok to join our dynamic team. This is an incredible opportunity for someone who is passionate about creating engaging and unique videos for our TikTok account. As a Content Creator, you will play a vital role in developing and implementing our TikTok content strategy.

In this role, you will be responsible for creating and editing compelling TikTok videos that align with our brand. Your videos will be instrumental in attracting and engaging our target audience. To excel in this position, you must have a strong understanding of the TikTok platform and its trends. Keeping up with the latest TikTok challenges and viral trends will be essential to your success
We have one professional video to start

As a key member of our marketing team, you will collaborate closely with them to develop effective content strategies that resonate with our target audience. Your ability to think creatively and use innovative techniques to attract and engage viewers on TikTok will be crucial in achieving our goals.

To be considered for this position, you must be proficient in using TikTok's features and editing tools. Your strong video editing skills will allow you to create visually appealing and high-quality content. Additionally, your knowledge of current TikTok trends and challenges will enable you to create content that is relevant and captivating.

This is a medium-sized project that is expected to last for 1 to 3 months. We are specifically seeking an intermediate-level Content Creator with prior experience in TikTok content creation. A strong portfolio showcasing your skills and creativity is highly preferred.

Joining our team as a Content Creator will give you the opportunity to work in a collaborative and innovative environment. You will have the chance to showcase your creativity and make a significant impact on our TikTok presence.

If you are a passionate and talented Content Creator who is ready to take on this exciting challenge, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and let us see how your TikTok expertise can elevate our brand to new heights!

Hourly Range: $9.00-$28.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 13:12 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a Editor for my Youtube videos - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an editor who can edit youtube videos. I want to set up a new channel about Movie Characters.

The videos would be about movie characters and would need some visual editing combined with relevant sourcing of content.

The budget would be around $25-40 per video (8-10 minute videos)

Looking for someone with experience in both editing and knowledge in the movie world (think more kids movies, star wars, marvel godzilla etc)

Looking forward to your response!
Type MOVIESTAR in your application so i know you have fully read this and you are not spamming. "

Best Regards

Budget: $400

item.title: Seeking Expert Instructor to Develop 'Mastering FL Studio' A Comprehensive Online Course - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Music Producers and FL Studio Experts!

My name is Bar, and I am looking for a highly skilled and passionate instructor to develop a detailed online course focused on FL Studio. The course, entitled "Mastering FL Studio: From Novice to Expert," aims to guide students through a comprehensive 4-hour journey into the world of music production using this popular digital audio workstation.

Here’s what I envision for this course:

The course should comprehensively cover FL Studio from the basics to advanced techniques, including sessions on workflow, sound design, mixing, and mastering. Each lesson should start with a face shot introduction explaining the topics and techniques to be covered, followed by screen recording for step-by-step demonstrations within FL Studio. Excellent audio quality is crucial, so a top-notch microphone and screen recording setup are necessary.

Requirements:

Extensive experience and expertise in using FL Studio for music production.
Ability to explain and demonstrate complex production techniques clearly.
Experience in teaching music production or creating educational content.
High-quality video recording and audio capture equipment.
Interested instructors, please provide:

Your professional background in music production, specifically with FL Studio.
A detailed outline of the proposed course content, ensuring a logical progression from beginner to advanced levels.
A sample video or links to your previous instructional content or music projects.
This is an excellent opportunity to share your expertise and passion for music production, helping aspiring producers master FL Studio and enhance their creative abilities.

Best regards,
Bar

Guidelines for Crafting a Course with Me 😊

Organize the course into lessons lasting 5-20 minutes each, aiming for a total duration of around 4 hours.
Provide engaging and descriptive titles for each lesson.
Start each lesson with a face shot introduction to the topics and techniques to be covered.
Upload raw footage via Google Drive (please avoid Dropbox or Upwork).
Include specific editing instructions for our video editor to enhance the educational quality of the videos.
The first lesson should introduce the course, FL Studio, and any necessary equipment or software.
Conclude the course with a comprehensive review of all topics covered and encourage students to continue exploring and creating with FL Studio.
Ensure accuracy and thoroughness in content by comparing it with similar courses.
Include a 1-minute introductory video for each major section of the course, with scripts provided by me.
Ensure all videos are delivered in 1920x1080 MP4, H264 format.

I am excited to see your proposals and to collaborate on creating an impactful FL Studio course!

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:54 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Sound Mixing, FL Studio, Education, Content Writing, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Curriculum Development, English
Skills: Sound Mixing, FL Studio, Education, Content Writing, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Curriculum Development, English
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and creative individual to assist us in creating engaging social media posts for TikTok and Instagram. The role will involve both video editing for talking head videos and graphic design for static posts. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media trends and be able to create visually appealing and captivating content that resonates with our target audience and adheres to our brand guide. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under deadlines are crucial. If you have a proven track record in social media content creation and possess the skills listed below, we would love to hear from you:

- Video editing
- Graphic design
- Social media best practices

Help us elevate our brand presence across social media platforms!

item.title: Video Editor for Music Streaming App Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
Description: We are looking for a talented video editor to create an engaging and captivating promotional reel for our electronic music streaming app. The video should highlight the unique offerings of our platform, Formaviva, and present the music in an appealing way. Your work will help us attract new users and build excitement around our app.

Responsibilities:
- Edit a promotional video that is visually engaging and highlights the electronic music available on Formaviva.
- Ensure the video captures the essence and energy of the music on our platform.
- Incorporate elements that make the video catchy and attention-grabbing.
- Utilize existing content and inspiration from Formaviva’s Instagram and TikTok profiles.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio of previous work.
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling and how to engage an audience.
- Familiarity with electronic music and the music streaming industry.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief description of your approach to creating this promotional reel

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 12:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Slovenia
